section1.question2: Bereavement Leave Request Form and documentation of the death (obituary, funeral program, or death certificate)
section1.question5: 1. Employee must submit an Overtime Request Form to their supervisor at least 24 hours before the anticipated overtime. 2. Supervisor must approve and sign the form. 3. The approved form must be submitted to Payroll before the end of the pay period.
